attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LEHbc5CyRPDXMZ3DekH_description
attribs.current: Hit: 7 (1d10+2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

attribs.name: repeating_npcaction_-LEHbc5LS2vW4yrZDJ8E_description
attribs.current: The dragon exhales an icy blast of hail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 22 (5d8)([[5d8]]) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
